Class HookableSaxHandler.SaxPathExpressionChecker

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.index.HookableSaxHandler.SaxPathExpressionChecker
  • Enclosing class:
    HookableSaxHandler

    public static class HookableSaxHandler.SaxPathExpressionChecker
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a path in an XML document that can be evaluated while doing SAX parsing, and keeps track of the current matching state(s).
